mapper.select: select categ_now, categ_prt, categ_name from categ_tb where categ_prt is null

select pd_num, categ_now, pd_name, pd_price, pd_dc, pd_company, pd_detail, pd_img, pd_amount, pd_buy, pd_submit, pd_update from product_tb where categ_prt in(select categ_now from categ_tb where categ_now=#{categ_now})

select pd_num, categ_now, pd_name, pd_price, pd_dc, pd_company, pd_detail, pd_img, pd_amount, pd_buy, pd_submit, pd_update from (select pd_num, categ_now, pd_name, pd_price, pd_dc, pd_company, pd_detail, pd_img, pd_amount, pd_buy, pd_submit, pd_update, row_number() over(order by pd_num desc) p_seq from product_tb where (pd_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (pd_detail like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) where p_seq between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd}
select count(pd_num) from product_tb where (pd_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%') or (pd_detail like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
select pd_num, categ_now, pd_name, pd_price, pd_dc, pd_company, pd_detail, pd_img, pd_amount, pd_buy, pd_submit, pd_update from product_tb where pd_num=#{pd_num}
